items.sentence: I know that Tom knew why I needed to do that.
I know that Tom knew that Mary had done that.
I know that Tom knew that I couldn't do that.
I know that Tom knew he had to do that today.
I know that Tom isn't planning on doing that.
I know that Tom isn't going to be doing that.
I know that Tom is still planning to do that.
I know that Tom wanted us to do that for him.
I know that Tom usually does that by himself.
I know that Tom should've refused to do that.
